name: Transgender
description: A flag representing transgender individuals — those whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

name: Rainbow
description: The classic rainbow flag representing the LGBTQ+ community as a whole, symbolizing diversity and inclusion.

name: Nonbinary
description: A flag representing nonbinary individuals — those who do not identify exclusively as male or female.

name: Bisexual
description: A flag representing bisexual individuals — traditionally understood as attraction to two genders, now often seen as attraction to more than one gender.

name: Pansexual
description: A flag representing pansexual individuals — those who experience attraction regardless of gender.

name: Asexual
description: A flag representing asexual individuals — those who experience little or no sexual attraction.

name: Genderqueer
description: A flag representing genderqueer individuals — those whose gender identity falls outside the traditional binary.

name: Agender
description: A flag representing agender individuals — those who identify as having no gender or a neutral gender.

name: Lesbian
description: A flag representing lesbians — women who are romantically or sexually attracted to other women.

name: Genderfluid
description: A flag representing genderfluid individuals — those whose gender identity shifts or changes over time.

name: Demiboy
description: A flag representing demiboys — individuals who partially identify as male, but not wholly or exclusively.

name: Demigirl
description: A flag representing demigirls — individuals who partially identify as female, but not wholly or exclusively.

name: Femboy
description: A flag representing femboys — individuals who identify as male but embrace traditionally feminine traits and aesthetics.

name: Cuddleplushgender
description: Cuddleplushgender is a xenogender under the Bedtime System umbrella that is related to cuddling a plush close while drifting to sleep.

name: Boi
description: Boi is a term for Black transgender and/or non-binary individuals. It is similar to boy but is separate from the white/Western gender binary. The name draws inspiration from African American Vernacular English (AAVE). This definition is exclusive to Black individuals.

name: Catboygender
description: Catboygender is a xenogender related to catboys or being a catboy. This gender can also mean being catgender with a masculine or androgynous lean.

name: Catgirlgender
description: Catgirlgender is a xenogender where one feels a very strong connection to catgirls and/or associates their gender with catgirls. The term is also commonly used by those who are catgender and female, feminine-aligned, or feminine in nature.
